product_name: FalconGuides Touring Colorado Hot Springs - 2nd Edition
long_description: Relax in the 32 different soothing hot springs found throughout Colorado! The updated Touring Colorado Hot Springs will direct you to both developed and undeveloped springs.
short_description: Relax in the 32 different soothing hot springs found throughout Colorado! The updated Touring Colorado Hot Springs will direct you to both developed and undeveloped springs.
